title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Drift Tuning Upgrades
content:
The Drift Tuning Upgrade is now available for three new vehicles at the LS Car Meet: the Dinka Jester Classic (Sports), Karin Futo (Sports), and RUNE Cheburek (Sports Classic, 30% off).

Maintain control around corners and rack up huge combos en route to Drift deity status in Drift Races to earn 2X GTA$ and RP (stacking to 4X for GTA+ Members) this week.

Participate in any three Drift Races to complete the new Weekly Challenge and earn a GTA$100,000 prize purse.
